allFeatures: Engine: 1.8L Hybrid DOHC 16-Valve VVT-i ~ Transmission: CVTi ~ Engine Auto Stop-Start Feature ~ Transmission w/Driver Selectable Mode ~ Front-Wheel Drive ~ Battery w/Run Down Protection ~ Hybrid Electric Motor ~ Gas-Pressurized Shock Absorbers ~ Front And Rear Anti-Roll Bars ~ Electric Power-Assist Steering ~ Single Stainless Steel Exhaust ~ 11.4 Gal. Fuel Tank ~ Strut Front Suspension w/Coil Springs ~ Multi-Link Rear Suspension w/Coil Springs ~ Regenerative 4-Wheel Disc Brakes w/4-Wheel ABS; Front Vented Discs; Brake Assist; Hill Hold Control and Electric Parking Brake ~ Lithium Ion Traction Battery ~ Wheels: 15' Machined Alloy ~ Tires: P195/65R15 All-Season
